metadata.og:title: File:Atelier Nadar - Léopold I. (1790-1865), König von Belgien seit 1831 (Zeno Fotografie).jpg - Wikimedia Commons

text:
Author


Atelier Nadar


Description


English:  Portrait of Leopold I (1790-1865), King of the Belgians since 1831. 
From the Atelier Nadar. King Leopold met Félix Nadar for the first time when Nadar launched his hot air balloon "Le Géant" in Brussels in 1864. The king jokingly told Nadar that he hoped he would jettison all the balloon's sand ballast while over Belgium because it was Belgian sand and that, as king, he had sworn to defend the national soil. (Georges Barral, Impressions aériennes d'un compagnon de Nadar, etc., Paris. 1864, p. 16.)
Deutsch:  Atelier Nadar: Léopold I. (1790-1865), König von Belgien seit 1831


Date

circa 1864date QS:P571,+1864-00-00T00:00:00Z/9,P1480,Q5727902


Source/Photographer

Image

Zeno.org, ID number 20001849204


Permission(Reusing this file)

Deutsch:  GemeinfreiEnglish:  Public domain

CollectionInfoFieldDeutsch:  5.000 Meisterwerke der FotografieEnglish:  5,000 Masterpieces of Photography

NotesInfoFieldDeutsch:  Porträt
